item.title: About Jeff
item.author: jeff@jeffborder.net (Jeff Border)
item.description: Jeff is an experienced architect for both hybrid cloud and dev(sec)ops. He started his career in the early 90’s managing travel systems IT including reservation systems e.g. SystemOne/Amadeus. He architected (and coded) the first add-on to allow travel reservation agents to send PNRs via fax and/or email. Since then, he’s been consulting in ERP, CRM, IAM and dev(sec)ops for those. Jeff holds the following certifications: This is column 2.
